Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:20.930]I was good on my own
[00:22.130]That's the way it was, that's the way it was
[00:25.810]You was good on the low for a faded fuck
[00:29.290]On some faded love
[00:30.340]Shit, what the fuck you complaining for?
[00:33.120]Feeling jaded, huh?
[00:34.970]Used to trip off that shit I was kickin' to you
[00:37.300]Had some fun on the run though I give it to you
[00:39.100]
[00:39.640]But, baby, don't get it twisted
[00:43.130]You was just another nigga on the hit list
[00:46.010]Tryna fix your inner issues with a bad bitch
[00:48.250]Didn't they tell you that I was a savage?
[00:51.240]Fuck your white horse and a carriage
[00:53.080]Bet you never could imagine
[00:56.070]Never told you, you could have it
[00:57.660]
[00:57.810]You needed me
[01:04.690]Ooh, you needed me
[01:16.930]Feel a little more and give a little less
[01:21.010]Know you hate to confess
[01:23.650]But, baby, who, you needed me
[01:30.380]
[01:35.800]You been rollin' around, shit, I'm rolling up
[01:39.340]Light and roll it up
[01:40.640]Break it down like a pound, shit was never us
[01:43.970]Shit was never us
[01:45.260]That's the real on the real. Are you serious?
[01:48.700]How you feel, how you feel?
[01:49.790]Used to trip off that shit I was kickin' to you
[01:52.230]Had some fun on the run though, I give it to you
[01:54.170]
[01:54.420]But, baby, don't get it twisted (don't get)
[01:58.950]You was just another nigga on the hit list
[02:01.090]Tryna fix your inner issues with a bad bitch
[02:03.280]Didn't they tell you that I was a savage?
[02:06.270]Fuck your white horse and a carriage
[02:08.160]Bet you never could imagine
[02:10.940]Never told you, you could have it
[02:12.550]
[02:12.750]You needed me
[02:18.320]Ooh, you needed me
[02:32.610]To feel a little more and give a little less
[02:36.940]Know you hate to confess
[02:39.540]But, baby, who, you needed me
